name: Wizard Duel (Konrax)
description:
This is my first attempt at making a game, and I'm going to attempt to flesh out this prototype in the coming months.

A simple top down shoot-em-up versus game.  Requires two controllers to play.

A button - dash

Y button - reflect projectiles

Hold right trigger and move the right joystick to aim your shot.

Holding the trigger for enough time gives you a charged shot, it moves faster but is larger and easier to reflect.

First player to lose their health loses, after 60 seconds, if both players are still alive, whoever got the most projectiles into the enemy goal wins.

there is a small bar near your character, it shows you how much more you can shoot before it needs to recharge.
